QuestData.Title: Keep 'Em on Their Heels
QuestData.Description: We've suffered heavy casualties here, $r.$b$bThe only good news is that we've given as much as we've taken. I've requested more troops, but the bulk of our forces are bogged down in Venture Bay. It looks like we're on our own for now.$b$bNo matter how bad it gets, we MUST stand our ground! The precious resources of this region are essential to the Horde's long-term success in Northrend.$b$bWe've got to keep the Alliance on their heels until help arrives. Get out there and give 'em something to think about.
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Bargok wants you to kill 15 Alliance units or players in Blue Sky Logging Ground.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is that Alliance blood on your weapon, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Fifteen down, eh? Good to hear it, $c.$B$BIf nothing else you've bought us a bit of time - at least a day by my figuring.$B$BHere's your pay.
